title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time. It seems that the exported jar file includes itself, causing the synchronization issue.
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself, preventing the synchronization issue.
SR: 1. Open a project. 2. Export the project directory as a jar file. 3. Place the exported jar file in the same project directory. 4. Attempt to overwrite the exported jar file by exporting the project directory again. Observe the out of sync message.
